description: The Turkish nationalist organisation vandalised a memorial to the Armenian genocide in Lyon.
title: Grey Wolves: Far-right group to be banned in France
title_page: Grey Wolves: Far-right group to be banned in France - BBC News
maintext: Fighting between Armenia and Azerbaijan erupted over the mountainous territory of Nagorno-Karabakh in September. The region is internationally recognised as part of Azerbaijan, but it is controlled by ethnic Armenians.
